publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2883.2 Ms Wendy Alexander: Nuclear Power Stations-As an amendment to motion (S1M-2883) in the name of Bruce Crawford, leave out from "and believes" to "nuclear" and insert "under the Transfer of Functions Order 1999 (SI 1999 No.1750), and believes that the final decision over consent under the Electricity Act 1989 for such". Supported by: Lewis Macdonald*
